Package org.forgerock.openam.rest

Class LocalSSOTokenSessionModule

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.forgerock.openam.rest.LocalSSOTokenSessionModule
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.forgerock.caf.authentication.api.AsyncServerAuthModule
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    OptionalSSOTokenSessionModule
    public class LocalSSOTokenSessionModule
extends Object
implements org.forgerock.caf.authentication.api.AsyncServerAuthModule
    A local implementation of a SSOToken Session module, that is designed to be deployed in an OpenAM deployment not remotely, i.e. protecting resources on another server which uses OpenAM for authentication. The SSOToken module will validate the presents and validity of a SSOToken ID on a request, if present and valid then the request is allowed to proceed. The responsibilities of this module are only to validate but never to issue a SSOToken, for this the client must authenticate before trying to access the resource again.

      • validateRequest

        public org.forgerock.util.promise.Promise<javax.security.auth.message.AuthStatus,​org.forgerock.caf.authentication.api.AuthenticationException> validateRequest​(org.forgerock.caf.authentication.api.MessageInfoContext messageInfo,
                                                                                                                                                                     Subject clientSubject,
                                                                                                                                                                     Subject serviceSubject)
        Validates the request by checking the validity of the SSOToken ID from the AM cookie.

        If the SSOToken ID is a restricted token then the request must also contain a url parameter "requester" which must contain the application SSOToken ID of the application the restricted token was issued for.

        Specified by:
        validateRequest in interface org.forgerock.caf.authentication.api.AsyncServerAuthModule
        Parameters:
        messageInfo -
        clientSubject -
        serviceSubject -
        Returns:
